Properties.ProtectedString:
--Stickmasterluke
sp=script.Parent
r=game:service("RunService") debris=game:GetService("Debris")
anims={"RightSlash","LeftSlash","OverHeadSwing"}
swingrate=1.1 basedamage=2 slashdamage=9 swingdamage=14 damage=basedamage
sword=sp.Handle sp.Taunting.Value=false
local SlashSound=Instance.new("Sound") SlashSound.SoundId="rbxasset://sounds\\swordslash.wav" SlashSound.Parent=sword SlashSound.Volume=.7
local UnsheathSound=Instance.new("Sound") UnsheathSound.SoundId="rbxasset://sounds\\unsheath.wav" UnsheathSound.Parent=sword UnsheathSound.Volume=.5
function waitfor(parent,name) while true do local child=parent:FindFirstChild(name) if child~=nil then return child end wait() end end waitfor(sp,"Taunting") waitfor(sp,"RunAnim")
function rndm() return (math.random()-.5)*2 end
function tagHumanoid(humanoid,player) for i,v in ipairs(humanoid:GetChildren()) do if v.Name=="creator" then v:remove() end end local creator_tag=Instance.new("ObjectValue") creator_tag.Value=player creator_tag.Name="creator" creator_tag.Parent=humanoid debris:AddItem(creator_tag,1) end
function blow(hit) if hit.Parent~=nil then local humanoid=hit.Parent:findFirstChild("Humanoid") local vCharacter=sp.Parent if vCharacter~=nil then local vPlayer=game.Players:playerFromCharacter(vCharacter) if vPlayer~=nil then local hum=vCharacter:findFirstChild("Humanoid") if humanoid~=nil then if hum~=nil and humanoid~=hum and hum.Health>0 then local right_arm=vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Right Arm") if right_arm~=nil then local joint=right_arm:FindFirstChild("RightGrip") if joint~=nil and (joint.Part0==sword or joint.Part1==sword) then tagHumanoid(humanoid,vPlayer) local t=hit.Parent:FindFirstChild("Torso") if t~=nil then local iceweld=t:FindFirstChild("IceWeld") if iceweld~=nil then if iceweld.Part1 and iceweld.Part1~=nil then local sound=sp.Handle:FindFirstChild("ShatterSound") if sound then sound:Stop() sound:Play() end for i=1,15 do local p=Instance.new("Part") p.Name="Effect" p.BrickColor=BrickColor.new("Pastel light blue") p.FormFactor="Custom" p.Size=Vector3.new(3*math.random(),3*math.random(),3*math.random()) p.Transparency=.3 p.Reflectance=.3 --p.CanCollide=false p.TopSurface="Smooth" p.BottomSurface="Smooth" p.CFrame=iceweld.Part1.CFrame*CFrame.new(rndm()*5,rndm()*8,rndm()*5) p.Velocity=Vector3.new(rndm(),rndm(),rndm())*100 p.RotVelocity=Vector3.new(rndm(),rndm(),rndm())*10 debris:AddItem(p,3+7*math.random()) p.Parent=game.Workspace end iceweld.Part1:remove() end t:BreakJoints() end end humanoid:TakeDamage(damage) end end end end end end end end
sp.Enabled=true function onActivated() if sp.Enabled and not sp.Taunting.Value then sp.Enabled=false local character=sp.Parent; local humanoid=character.Humanoid if humanoid==nil then print("Humanoid not found") return end SlashSound:play() newanim=anims[math.random(1,#anims)] while newanim==sp.RunAnim.Value do newanim=anims[math.random(1,#anims)] end sp.RunAnim.Value=newanim if newanim=="OverHeadSwing" then damage=swingdamage else damage=slashdamage end wait(swingrate) damage=basedamage sp.Enabled=true end end
function onEquipped() UnsheathSound:play() end
sp.Activated:connect(onActivated) sp.Equipped:connect(onEquipped)
connection=sword.Touched:connect(blow)

--Made by Stickmasterluke
local sp=script.Parent
originalgrip=CFrame.new(0,-1.5,0)*CFrame.Angles(0,math.pi/2,0) currentgrip=originalgrip debris=game:GetService("Debris")
enabled=true taunting=false check=true
function waitfor(parent,name) while true do local child=parent:FindFirstChild(name) if child~=nil then return child end wait() end end
waitfor(sp,"Handle")
function onButton1Down(mouse) if not enabled then return end enabled=false mouse.Icon="rbxasset://textures\\GunWaitCursor.png" wait(.75) mouse.Icon="rbxasset://textures\\GunCursor.png" enabled=true end
function swordUp() currentgrip=originalgrip end
function swordOut() currentgrip=originalgrip*CFrame.Angles(math.pi/4,.4,0) end
function spinsword(spintime) delay(0,function() local startspin=tick() local endspin=startspin+spintime while tick()<endspin do sp.Grip=currentgrip*CFrame.Angles(math.pi*2*((tick()-startspin)/spintime),0,0) wait() end sp.Grip=currentgrip end) end
function onEquippedLocal(mouse) local currentlast=lastequipped if mouse==nil then print("Mouse not found") return end mouse.Icon="rbxasset://textures\\GunCursor.png" mouse.Button1Down:connect(function() onButton1Down(mouse) end) waitfor(sp,"Taunting") waitfor(sp,"TonightsForcast") waitfor(script,"Script") mouse.KeyDown:connect(function(key) key=string.lower(key) if key=="l" or key=="t" or key=="g" or key=="e" or key=="q" then -- :3 local h=sp.Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") local la=sp.Parent:FindFirstChild("Left Arm") local t=sp.Parent:FindFirstChild("Torso") if h~=nil and h.Health>0 and la~=nil and t~=nil and check then check=false sp.Taunting.Value=true h.WalkSpeed=.1 tauntanim=h:LoadAnimation(sp.TonightsForcast) tauntanim:Play() swordUp() sp.Grip=currentgrip wait(1) local sound=sp.Handle:FindFirstChild("FreezeSound") if sound then sound:Play() end local p=Instance.new("Part") p.Name="Effect" p.CanCollide=false p.Transparency=1 p.FormFactor="Custom" p.Size=Vector3.new(0,0,0) local frost=Instance.new("Smoke") frost.Color=Color3.new(.8,.8,1) frost.Size=.5 frost.RiseVelocity=8 frost.Parent=p local w=Instance.new("Motor") w.Part0=la w.Part1=p w.C0=CFrame.new(0,0,0)*CFrame.Angles(math.pi,0,0) w.Parent=p debris:AddItem(p,6) p.Parent=la wait(.7) for i=1,8 do if p and p.Parent~=nil then local p2=Instance.new("Part") p2.Name="Effect" p2.Transparency=1 p2.BrickColor=BrickColor.new("Bright red") p2.CanCollide=false p2.FormFactor="Custom" p2.Position=p.Position p2.Shape="Ball" p2.Size=Vector3.new(3,3,3) p2.Velocity=(t.CFrame.lookVector*40)+(Vector3.new((math.random()-.5)*2,(math.random()-.5)*2,(math.random()-.5)*2)*8) local bf=Instance.new("BodyForce") bf.force=Vector3.new(0,p2:GetMass()*196.2,0) bf.Parent=p2 local sc=script.Script:clone() sc.Parent=p2 sc.Disabled=false local c=Instance.new("ObjectValue") c.Name="creator" c.Value=game.Players.LocalPlayer c.Parent=p2 debris:AddItem(p2,1) p2.Parent=game.Workspace end wait(.35) end local sound=sp.Handle:FindFirstChild("FreezeSound") if sound then sound:Stop() end wait(.2) if p then p:remove() end h.WalkSpeed=16 sp.Taunting.Value=false check=true end end end) end sp.Equipped:connect(onEquippedLocal)
waitfor(sp,"RunAnim") sp.RunAnim.Changed:connect(function() local h=sp.Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") local t=sp.Parent:FindFirstChild("Torso") local anim=sp:FindFirstChild(sp.RunAnim.Value) if anim and t and h then theanim=h:LoadAnimation(anim) if theanim and h.Health>0 then theanim:Play() if sp.RunAnim.Value=="RightSlash" then spinsword(.5) end if sp.RunAnim.Value=="OverHeadSwing" then wait(.25) swordOut() sp.Grip=currentgrip wait(.5) swordUp() sp.Grip=currentgrip elseif sp.RunAnim.Value=="OverHeadSwingFast" then wait(.125) swordOut() sp.Grip=currentgrip wait(.25) swordUp() sp.Grip=currentgrip end end end end)

--Stickamsterluke
sp=script.Parent
debris=game:GetService("Debris")
sp.Touched:connect(function(hit) if hit and hit~=nil and hit.Parent~=nil then local c=sp:FindFirstChild("creator") local h=hit.Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") local t=hit.Parent:FindFirstChild("Torso") if c~=nil and h~=nil and t~=nil then if c.Value and c.Value~=nil and t:FindFirstChild("IceWeld")==nil then local plr=game.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(hit.Parent) if plr then if plr==c.Value then return end end local p=Instance.new("Part") p.Name="Effect" p.BrickColor=BrickColor.new("Pastel light blue") p.FormFactor="Custom" p.Size=Vector3.new(5,8,5) p.Transparency=.3 p.Reflectance=.3 p.CanCollide=false p.TopSurface="Smooth" p.BottomSurface="Smooth" local cf=CFrame.Angles(0,math.pi*2*math.random(),.5*math.random()) p.CFrame=t.CFrame*cf local w=Instance.new("Motor") w.Name="IceWeld" w.Part0=t w.Part1=p w.C0=CFrame.Angles(0,math.pi*2*math.random(),.5*math.random()) w.Parent=t debris:AddItem(p,8) p.Parent=game.Workspace h.WalkSpeed=0 delay(0,function() wait(10+math.random()) if h and h~=nil then h.WalkSpeed=16 end if p and p~=nil then p:remove() end end) sp:remove() end end end end) wait(.8) sp:remove()
